items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality sweater
items.body: I was surprised at the quality of this sweater. Perfect fit. Only problem is the wrinkles - I get that it saves space to vacuum pack mass amounts but wish there was another way to transport Read more
items.author: D

items.body: Very cozy and soft. Not itchy. Machines wash cold and let air dry. Still felt great Read more

items.author: Chelsea DiMillo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and cozy, but you can't push up the sleeves
items.body: This eyelash sweater is super soft and cozy, with a relaxed fit. The silhouette is somewhat boxy, but this can be broken up by tucking in part of the hem as seen in my photos. It hasn't been cold enough for me to wear it yet, so I can't attest to how it holds up over time, but the quality appears to be good. I will definitely be following the manufacturer's recommendation to wash in cold water and lay flat to dry, with the additional precaution of putting the sweater in a mesh zipper bag and using the delicate cycle. The one thing I don't like about the sweater is how huge the sleeves are - there isn't really any way to push the sleeves up because they won't stay up, and I feel like all of that extra fabric is just going to get in the way and annoy me. I didn't deduct any stars for this because 1) you can clearly see in the item photos that the sleeves are large, so I knew this might be an issue, and 2) this is my personal preference and not a flaw with the item. I only mention it in case you share my obsession with being able to push up your sleeves to get them out of the way and are wondering if you'll be able to do that with this sweater. Read more
items.author: K. Wright

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Flattering, and the Perfect Fall/Winter Color!
items.body: I love this chunky turtleneck sweater! The wine red color is absolutely beautiful — rich, warm, and perfect for fall and winter. The material is soft and cozy without feeling heavy or itchy, and it keeps me nice and warm on chilly days. The fit is true to size with just the right amount of room for that comfy, slightly relaxed look. It pairs perfectly with jeans or leggings, and the turtleneck isn’t too tight — it’s cozy without feeling restrictive. Overall, this is a great-quality sweater that looks stylish and feels amazing to wear. I’ve already gotten several compliments on the color and fit. Highly recommend if you’re looking for a classic, cozy piece for the colder months! Read more
items.author: Mika

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars sweater
items.body: I love how cozy this sweater is! It came quickly, and the quality of the fuzzy, chunky knit is incredibly soft and warm—perfect for cold days. The loose, casual fit (followed vendor size guide) is comfortable for layering. Definitely my new favorite warm winter pullover Read more
items.author: Are

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Burgundy, Apricot, Army Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
